title: Nicholas Varabioff
summary: I'm passionate about Software Development, always looking for efficient and different solutions to daily problems. I'm looking to give my best for the company I'm working with, and grow as a person and co-worker.
about1: My name is Nicholas Varabioff. I'm originally from Vancouver, and am currently in the fourth year of my undergraduate degree in Systems Design Engineering at the University of Waterloo.
about2: Outside of work, I love problem solving, playing chess, listening to podcasts, playing and watching competitive sports, and listening to all varieties of music. I'm excited to pursue an opportunity in which I can apply my skills in a challenging environment.
about3: I am currently seeking internship opportunities for Winter 2020 in Software Engineering and Product Management, so feel free to reach out if you know of any suitable opportunities!

projects.title: NHL Player Salary Predictor
projects.description: Salary cap management is a key component of sports management, and this involves evaluating player performence to ensure each player is offered a fair contract. Using historical NHL player performance and salary data, I worked on a 2 person team that evaluated the effectiveness of different regression algorithms to predict the salaries of NHL skaters.

projects.title: Search Engine
projects.description: Following project structure from MSCI 541 - Search Engines, I developed search engine that implements document parsing, language tokenization, and document ranking on fixed document collection.

projects.title: Carbon Calculator
projects.description: For my Engineering Capstone project, our team is working to create a carbon emissions calculator for infrastructure projects. This calculator will account for Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions and provide investors with information and recommendations for reducing the carbon footprint of their infrastructure projects.

projects.title: Build-a-Beat
projects.description: For a Systems Design Engineering course, our team built a tool that uses Genetic Algorithms to assist users in creating original music tracks. This involved initial generation of a random track along with application of a mutation Genetic Algorithm.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: At HockeyShot, I worked on the development of the HockeyShot Smart Shooting Tarp product. My primary tasks focused on the development of the mobile application (developed in Flutter) that tracks and measures user performance. For this application, I was in charge of designing and implementing the database schema to store user information.

experiences.title: Jr. Software Developer
experiences.description: At Emtelligent, I developed a Python tool from scratch to automate the downloading and cleaning of medical ontology data. This turned what used to be a technically demanding hour-long manual process to take only a few minutes with minimal knowledge required by the user. I also wrote SQL scripts to configure data in MySQL databases and integrated these databases with the Emtelligent Natural Language Processing engine.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: At MMC, I was in charge of regression testing of the internal revenue management system. This included developing SQL scripts to create testing data and daily reports of regression testing results.

experiences.title: Embedded Controls (Diagnostics)
experiences.description: At GM, I was in charge of the create of a standalone Hardware-In-Loop Test Bench to streamline testing of the Body Control Module. This involved modelling complex vehicle systems using MATLAB/Simulink, writing embedded software to simulate signals between the Body Control Module and multiple other in-vehicle microcontrollers, and implementing complete hardwiring of testing bench setup.

experiences.title: Tier 1 Technical Support
experiences.description: As Tier 1 Technical Support, I interacted with customers directly to resolve issues with customer internet, phone, email, and other internet service provider services.

experiences.title: Lifeguard
experiences.description: Over the summer, I worked as a Lifeguard at the St. George's Pool supervising swimmers and other general lifeguarding duties.
